properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes California out to 10 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 14 at 1:42PM PST until January 16 at 3:00AM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 20 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 40 kt and seas 8 to 12 feet at 13 seconds
expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, south winds 15 to 25
kt with gusts up to 30 kt expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes
California out to 10 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 9 PM Wednesday to 3 AM PST
Thursday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 3 PM to 9 PM PST
Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM TO 9 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM WEDNESDAY TO 3 AM PST THURSDAY
